Text:
Hey Commando,

It seems that your Killer Instinct torrents are not very popular. What people dont realize that its almost near impossible to locate the CHD online anywhere but through you, which makes you my next best friend!

I have a blogger emulation website, and I was wondering with your permission, if I can copy your torrent url to connect with my website for those that need this torrent since its unavaible elswhere?

So far nobody has mentioned if it works so I am taking your word for it!

If so please let me know if I can share your torrents of both Killer Instincts chds on my blogger site, thanks.

my site: 
http://emufactoryunlimited.blogspot.com

-Chuck
